price: Ба унвони раҳмате аз Парвардигорат. Бе тардид, Ӯ шунавои доност
arabic: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: raḥmatan min rabbika innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
